page.title: 02Housing in Vernham Dean CP
page.content: The few dwellings in the area cover a broad spectrum, ranging from a mansion house, Conholt Manor, to wooden shacks, which were probably built as weekend cottages in the 1920/30's and are now used for permanent accommodation. Most of the dwellings are privately owned or are tied to a farm or estate, although there are a few council houses on the outskirts of Upton. The majority of the dwellings are constructed of brick and flint. The flints being available locally. A number of the dwellings are thatched.
